content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our Mission and Goal Statement\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"People Management team aims to provide the Company with the structure and the ability to meet business needs through managing EPAM most valuable resources - its employees. Trying to create transparent environment EPAM People Management Organization establishes the best practices in relationship management between Employee and Employer across the Company using competency- and process-driven approach and implements improvements aimed at increasing Employee’s satisfaction and engagement and work with our Employee Value Proposition:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Create environment where diverse and motivated people have opportunity to perform, develop their talent and skills and contribute to company success.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Establish satisfaction.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Minimize In giant organizations and large-scale businesses, there should be allocated people management practice compartmentalized into four following segments:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":29636,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f628b658-eae1-4c8e-8243-d21c9ec6b9b9/14.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f628b658-eae1-4c8e-8243-d21c9ec6b9b9/14.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"14.PNG\",\"name\":\"14.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"f628b658-eae1-4c8e-8243-d21c9ec6b9b9\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":574,\"height\":565},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Permissions to People Data\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To effectively perform people advisory and partnership in your pools you will need to see the team’s personal data in EPAM applications and reports, get process triggered notifications, and have permissions to perform actions in process workflow, e.g., submit exit interview. All these permissions are associated with a special role \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"‘HR Contact’\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please follow \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMHRMKB/Roles%3A+HR+Contact%2C+People+Partner\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"this link\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to get full details on permissions granted to this role.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Another \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"‘People Partner’\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" role indicates contact point information for employees on UI of our applications. This role does not grant any permissions and only serves to navigate employees to those members of people team who is responsible for dealing with people requests and questions.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Based on your scope of responsibilities you may need both roles ‘HR Contact’ (permissions) and ‘People Partner’ (contact point) or only ‘HR Contact’ role.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Roles of ‘HR Contact’ and ‘People Partner’ can be assigned to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://people.epam.com/org-chart/3/5064e067-7250-4e58-a1ab-48f92b941815/structure\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Unit (+country)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://people.epam.com/org-chart/4/f5c4b3f6-1d88-40ec-8409-dee037889c17/structure\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Project (+country)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://people.epam.com/org-chart/2/3ca24ef0-9ec1-4ed6-b76d-03440b7e606e/structure\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Location\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://people.epam.com/profile\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PEOPLE\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is a master system for all of them.
